nodes.bodyText: for some reason version doesn't default as intended when running from IDE
I wasn't checking if the version was null in the getQuestDbVersion method. 🤦‍♂️
Delivering build information to server can be done via BuildInformation interface above, which configuration can keep the reference to.
Perhaps we should try to keep this information on single line, otherwise its tricky to have it displayed correctly to multiple clients:

Then we don't even need the Memoizer. The instance will be a StrFunction.
Regarding thread safety, if I'm understanding correctly, you are saying to do the same that is done when computing the hash of a string, right?
